reviews.text: I bought 30 of these to replace all the light switches in our new house to paddle switches. In the last 6 months, cracks are starting to develop in the paddles. So far we have replaced 10 of them. Made in China low quality polycarbonate.

reviews.title: Polycarbonate cracks on 30% within 2 years.

reviews.productTitle: CML Single Pole Decorator Light Switch, 20 Pack Rocker Paddle Wall Switch, 15A 120/277V, On/Off Interrupter, UL Listed, White
reviews.text: The color of the light switch does not match the color of the plate they’re both supposed to be gloss white and the color is obviously not the same and stands out very aggressively. I had to redo the entire job and buy things from Home Depot where I should’ve bought them to begin with I never would’ve had to deal with this cheap Chinese stuff

reviews.title: Color is wrong. Does not match with plates.

reviews.productTitle: CML Single Pole Decorator Light Switch, 20 Pack Rocker Paddle Wall Switch, 15A 120/277V, On/Off Interrupter, UL Listed, White
reviews.text: Tab breaks off switch cover goes flying across the room hits dog, dog flies across room causing Giant ruckus! It only hit the Daisy the first time one of them broke. 5 have broken so far, don't think the other 15 will last the rest of the year. 1 star because they work and look nice.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on October 20, 2022
reviews.title: switches break
